    • registerNewStudent

      public int registerNewStudent(String username, String password, String role, String name, String department)
      Description copied from interface: StudentDaoInterface
      Registers a new student by inserting their information into the User and Student tables.
      Specified by:
      registerNewStudent in interface StudentDaoInterface
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the new student.
      password - The password for the new student's account.
      role - The role of the user, should be "Student".
      name - The name of the student.
      department - The department of the student.
      Returns:
      The generated student ID if the registration is successful, -1 if registration fails.
